about_the_game:
Season pass that includes Additional Card Set Vol. 1 to Vol. 4.

[SEASON PASS CONTENTS]
- Additional Card Set Vol.1 [D-BT06]: Blazing Dragon Reborn
- Additional Card Set Vol.2 [D-LBT03]: Lyrical Monasterio ~Summertime Memories!~
- Additional Card Set Vol.3 [D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm
- Additional Card Set Vol.4 [D-SS03]: Stride Deckset Chronojet


**The contents of each "Additional Card Set" will be unlocked sequentially as soon as they are released.
**Each item of the season pass can also be purchased separately. Please be careful not to purchase the same item twice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
